name: Alexis
description: Alexis is left on an unknown planet with no memories of how he got there. With him, there's only a strange and sarcastic companion, Will, which will guide our hero through their journey. As Will starts to talk, Alexis realizes he's been sent on a mission to explore this new planet and turn it livable so that one day it could be repopulated.Their  goal is to repair all the broken altars of the world, and with that, restore its elements which will bring balance to the planet once more. By turning it habitable, humankind can establish a colony with the few remaining thousands alive after a great disaster that came upon HETAR-20.
